YOU FUCKING ASSHOLE.
@HeartlessDame [He nods and kisses her forehead oh so gently.] I do feel better now. I just needed to calm down.
@HeartlessDame [He held her close to him, not wanting to let go at all at least not for a while.] It is all out now.
Man with a British accent, breaking hearts everywhere. https://t.co/3mHfwjumTe
@HeartlessDame No it's not worth it. I just needed to get it out of my system, that's all. [He pulls her in close to her.]
@HeartlessDame [He sighs and looks at her, placing his hands on top of hers.] I'm just pissed. I'm just glad both of you are okay.
I'm fucking livid.
It clearly doesn't take you that long to move on either.
I'm fucking furious with you and I have every right to be. You hurt my best friend.
You're lucky that I don't come after your fucking ass because believe me, I want to.
I swear to god the next person to hurt either one of those girls is going to have to deal with me.
anything in this world. They both are beautiful women.
I will always make sure that my best friends get treated the best. Especially Em and Kat because those girls deserve it more than -
All girls deserve to be treated with respect and loved. If you can't do that, don't get into a relationship.
